RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the agents: Jorge Luis Trevino and Hugo Benavides

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who testified about the black truck and camper, and noted that smugglers often use rental cars to avoid losing their own vehicles if caught
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Reymundo Reyes: Law enforcement officer who did not corroborate Agent Trevino's testimony about the camper
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who did not corroborate Agent Trevino's testimony about the camper
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Orona-Sanchez: Individual referenced in a court finding regarding alien smuggling using pickup trucks with camper shells
Defendant involved in a case regarding alien smuggling, whose vehicle was stopped by Agent Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino and Hugo Benavides: Border Patrol agents who testified in the case, with Jorge Luis Trevino providing details about the black truck and camper, and Hugo Benavides not corroborating this testimony
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.J. Scott Hacker: United States Magistrate Judge who considered the evidence presented in the case and gave little weight to the observation of the camper due to ambiguity surrounding its existence
